availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, Night Policeman in the 1st Ward. Iowa native. Married to Eliza J. Cross. Father of Mary L. Cross, Charles W. Cross, and Ida E.Cross.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 2, p. 249. Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 323. “An Efficient Policeman Dead” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), May 21, 1866, p. 1.
